summary: The diff implements the majority of requirements: pharma theme colors, font replacement, credential update, modal fixes, and theming across key pages. However, several specific requirements have gaps or are partially/not implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update frontend/index.css (root-level, not src/) to reflect new pharma color tokens, removing all neon-specific utilities
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows frontend/src/index.css was updated with pharma tokens, but frontend/index.css (root-level) is not listed as a modified file. The build request explicitly names both files.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove all neon glows, scanline effects, grid backgrounds, neonFlicker/pulseGlow animations from frontend/src/index.css
missing_requirements.reason: The frontend-file-summaries.txt entry for frontend/src/index.css explicitly states it still includes neon theme utilities including neon-text-glow text-shadow, neon-glow box-shadow, bg-grid-neon background pattern, and pulseGlow/animate-pulse-glow keyframe animation. This directly contradicts REQ-1.

missing_requirements.requirement: Apply pharma theme consistently to all public-facing pages including Products, AboutUs, and Contact pages
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not include modifications to frontend/src/pages/Products.tsx, frontend/src/pages/AboutUs.tsx, or frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx. These are listed as required pages in REQ-6 but are absent from the modified files list.

missing_requirements.requirement: Apply pharma theme to admin pages: EnquiryManagement, SalesReports, SalesPage, RevenuePage, IncomePage, TrendingPage, ProfilePage
missing_requirements.reason: None of these admin pages appear in the modified files list, so their theming updates cannot be confirmed.

missing_requirements.requirement: ProductManagement page should use pharma theme consistently
missing_requirements.reason: frontend/src/pages/ProductManagement.tsx is not in the modified files list, so its pharma theme update is unconfirmed.

hallucinated_features.description: Dark mode CSS variables block added to frontend/src/index.css
hallucinated_features.reason: A full .dark CSS variable block was added in frontend/src/index.css, but the build request makes no mention of dark mode support — only a light pharma theme was requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Top info bar with phone number and address added to PublicLayout
hallucinated_features.reason: A Top Info Bar with contact details was added to PublicLayout. This is a new UI feature not requested in the build spec.

hallucinated_features.description: rememberMe checkbox state added to AdminLogin
hallucinated_features.reason: A rememberMe state variable was added to AdminLogin.tsx. The build request only asked to change credentials and apply the pharma theme — no remember me feature was requested.
